A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So very disappointed with this movie. Why? The plot was dreadful\, aspects were so unoriginal - Leia flying through space\, Luke ducking under Kylos lightsaber - plus the way Luke was treated was abominable. I love the character\, he represents everything great about modern movies and heroism\, and yet he was treated like a pathetic old man in this film. If I was Mark Hamill\, I think I would have refused to play this part! Finally\, Snoke was killed in such an easy way\, it beggared belief. What exactly is there to look forward to in the next movie?
